body:
Okay, this is officially the weirdest bug I've ever encountered. And I can reliably reproduce it!

When I try to run `spack spec`, it hangs. I added the `--debug` flag and it looks like it's trying to run `ibv_devices`. The only reference I've found to `ibv_devices` is in the `openmpi` package.
